idea-plugin.name: Base16 Atelier Savanna
idea-plugin.vendor: Bram de Haan (http://atelierbramdehaan.nl), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Atelier Savanna for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Bram de Haan (http://atelierbramdehaan.nl). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
